scripts.androidDevelopmentDebugAPK: npm run clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentDebug && killall -9 java && open ./android/app/build/outputs/apk/development/debug
scripts.androidDevelopmentReleaseAPK: npm run clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentRelease && killall -9 java && open ./android/app/build/outputs/apk/development/release
scripts.androidDevelopmentReleaseAAB: npm run clean && cd android && ./gradlew bundleDevelopmentRelease && killall -9 java && open ./android/app/build/outputs/bundle/development/release
scripts.androidQaDebugAPK: npm run clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleQaDebug && killall -9 java && open ./android/app/build/outputs/apk/qa/debug
scripts.androidQaReleaseAPK: npm run clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleQaRelease && killall -9 java && open ./android/app/build/outputs/apk/qa/release
scripts.androidQaReleaseAAB: npm run clean && cd android && ./gradlew bundleQaRelease && killall -9 java && open ./android/app/build/outputs/bundle/qa/release
scripts.androidUatDebugAPK: npm run clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleUatDebug && killall -9 java && open ./android/app/build/outputs/apk/uat/debug
scripts.androidUatReleaseAPK: npm run clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleUatRelease && killall -9 java && open ./android/app/build/outputs/apk/uat/release
scripts.androidUatReleaseAAB: npm run clean && cd android && ./gradlew bundleUatRelease && killall -9 java && open ./android/app/build/outputs/bundle/uat/release
scripts.androidProductionDebugAPK: npm run clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionDebug && killall -9 java && open ./android/app/build/outputs/apk/development/debug
scripts.androidProductionReleaseAPK: npm run clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionRelease && killall -9 java && open ./android/app/build/outputs/apk/development/release
scripts.androidProductionReleaseAAB: npm run clean && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProductionRelease && killall -9 java && open ./android/app/build/outputs/bundle/development/release
